ValidationRule.description: Confirm Compliance (Sanctions Check + Compliance Decision) and Fraud (Decision + Recommendation) Checks pass before Credit Decision is Approved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Sanctions_Check__c, "Passed")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Compliance_Decision__c, "Approve")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Fraud_Decision__c, "Approved")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Fraud_Recommendation__c, "Recommend Approve"))), CONTAINS(":Approved - Counter Offer:Approved - Requested:Approved - Secured Requested:", ':' + TEXT(Credit_Decision__c) + ':'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Compliance (Sanctions Check + Compliance Decision) and Fraud (Decision + Recommendation) Checks must be complete before Credit Decision is Approved
